attributes.action: Establish a government of national unity at this time of crisis.
attributes.additional_details: We have made a decision as a country which has created divisions, fear and excitement depending on your view. The Union is in jeopardy and UK Plc will suffer while we have no direction and an unclear trading position. We cannot wait for party politics, this is not business as usual. Parliament needs to show leadership to ensure we have a clear path forward and which has support from across our nation.
attributes.background: We call on Parliament to establish a government of national unity. To bring us together, to set out our new global approach and then to implement our new European and global relationships within months and not years.
